directions: Place the bread open faced on a cookie sheet. Spread the butter on the bread, then the mayonnaise. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, Cheddar cheese and garlic salt.
Broil 6 to 8 minutes, until the cheese is melted and lightly browned.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, sliced horizontally
title: Cheese Bread
